input_output_options.title: Input/output options
input_output_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

input.description: Comma separated list of files that will be staged into the input directory.

script.description: Bash command line to be executed in process.

outputPattern.description: Pattern of output files to be captured as outputs and published.

output.description: Path where output files should be published to.

container.description: Docker container to use for running the process.

conda.description: List of Conda packages to used in the process (ignored when Docker is used).
